videos.description: Roberto Gallinat hammers down a dunk to give Pacific the lead over Gonzaga.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One Play (Gallinat slam gives Pacific early lead) 2019/02/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gallinat slam gives Pacific early lead

videos.description: Khy Kabellis hits a 3-pointer as the shot clock expires.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One play (Kabellis sinks 3 at shot clock buzzer) 2019/02/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kabellis sinks 3 at shot clock buzzer

videos.description: Rui Hachimura widens Gonzaga's lead with a deep 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Hachimura hits deep 3

videos.description: Brandon Clarke steals the ball and finds Rui Hachimura who hammers down a one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One Play (Clarke steal leads to Hachimura dunk) 2019/02/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Clarke steal leads to Hachimura dunk
